item.title: Cannot Send Email To Own Domain in Postfix
item.description: vi /etc/postfix/main.cf remove the domain ... ... #mydestination = example.com, localhost.com, localhost mydestination = localhost ... ... Then restart postfix: /etc/init.d/postix restart See some further discussion in https://www.digitalocean.com/community/questions/why-won-t-postfix-deliver-mail-to-own-domain
